#include<iostream>
#include<math.h>

using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    if(a == 0)
        return b;
    if(b == 0)
        return a;

    if(a % b == 0)
    {
        return b;
    }

    return gcd(b, a%b);

}

/*int countPrimeFac(int n)
{
    int c = 0, i;

    while(n % 2 == 0)
    {
        c++;
        n = n/2;
    }

    for(i = 3; i <= sqrt(n); i++)
    {
        while(n % i == 0)
        {
            c++;
            n = n/i;
        }
    }

    if(n > 2)
        c++;

    return c;
}*/

int main()
{
    int t, m, n, g, ans;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>m;

        n = n-1;
        m = m-1;

        if(n == 0 && m == 0)
        {
            cout<<1<<"\n";
            continue;
        }

        if(n > m)
        {
            g = gcd(n, m);
        }
        else
        {
            g = gcd(m, n);
        }


        cout<<g+1<<"\n";
        //cout<<countPrimeFac(g)+2<<"\n";

    }

    return 0;
}
